description:
Sink into the familiar anime art style of Hentai World. Progress through the story by solving all of the puzzles. The difficulty will increase depending on the "outfit" Sayuri's wearing. Every success on your part will make her happier!

Key Features:

- Hand-drawn Hentai art
- Relaxing music track
- New art pieces to unlock
- Simple gameplay mechanics
- Rewarding premise
name: Sayuri
